sentences: The SBI plenary first considered this issue on 2 June.
The LDC Expert Group (LEG) reported on its work ( FCCC/SBI/2009/6 ).
The issue was subsequently taken up in informal consultations facilitated by Margaret Sangarwe (Zimbabwe).

Discussions were straightforward, with many parties expressing concern regarding conditionalities attached to project financing, and the difficulty of accessing this financing to implement national adaptation programmes of action (NAPAs).
The SBI adopted conclusions on 10 June.
